Object.Name: Connected UE Report
Object.Description1: This LWM2M Object provides a range of information related to the connected UEs.

Item.Name: Connected User MMEC
Item.Description: MMEC signalled by the UE to the eNB in the RRCConnectionRequest message (see TS 36.331).

Item.Name: Connected User M-TMSI
Item.Description: M-TMSI signalled by the UE to the eNB in the RRCConnectionRequest message (see TS 36.331).

Item.Name: Serving Cell (CrowdBox) eNB RSRP
Item.Description: The RSRP of the CrowdBox eNB, as defined in TS 36.133, Section 9.1.4. Range: RSRP_00; RSRP_01 .. RSRP_97

Item.Name: Serving Cell (CrowdBox) eNB RSRQ
Item.Description: The RSRQ of the CrowdBox eNB, as defined in TS 36.133, Section 9.1.7. Range: RSRQ_-30; RSRQ_-29 .. RSRQ_46

Item.Name: Cumulative Timing Advance per Connected User
Item.Description: The cumulative timing advance signalled by the eNB to each currently connected UE. This is the sum of the initial timing advance signalled in the MAC payload of the Random Access Response (11 bits, 0 .. 1282) and subsequent adjustments signalled in the MAC PDU of DL-SCH transmissions (6 bits, -31 .. 32). See TS 36.321 for details.

Item.Name: Last downlink CQI report per Connected User
Item.Description: The last downlink wideband CQI reported by a connected user the eNB. The CQI format is defined in Table 7.2.3-1 of TS 36.213.

Item.Name: Cumulative Downlink Throughput per Connected User
Item.Description: The total number of MAC bytes sent to the connected user over the immediately preceding period specified by the "Cumulative Measurement Window" field.

Item.Name: Cumulative Uplink Throughput per Connected User
Item.Description: The total number of MAC bytes received from the connected user over the immediately preceding period specified by the "Cumulative Measurement Window" field.

Item.Name: Neighbour Cell Report
Item.Description: A link to the "Neighbour Cell Report" object for each neighbour cell reported to the CrowdBox by the connected UE
